pages.title: Where to look
pages.text: Search for a Plains biome. Maybe you get lucky!

pages.title: Concise Instructions
pages.text: In Plains biomes, you will find Clover growing in small patches, most of them with three, but some with four leaves. You can immediately notice a Four-Leaved Clover in its block form already and distinguish it from a three-leaved one. Break to harvest, Bonemeal/Nature's Staff to spread.
